definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]

sentences.english: The private key is used to access the Bitcoins kept in the payor's account.
sentences.chinese: 私钥用于访问比特币付款人的账户。

sentences.english: Otherwise again carry will automatically withdrew to form currency.
sentences.chinese: 否则再次提现将自动退到报单币。

sentences.english: Offenders will be fined 2, 000 Syrian pounds _ about $45.
sentences.chinese: 违者将处以2000叙利亚币的罚款，约45美元。

sentences.english: Method of payment for all other fees will be in Singapore dollar .
sentences.chinese: 其他课程费与额外费用的付款货币是新加坡币。

sentences.english: Bitcoin has a completely distributed architecture, without any single trusted entity.
sentences.chinese: 比特币的结构是完全分散式的，没有任何可信实体。

sentences.english: We will pay you as soon as possible after you deliver us the gold or items.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在收到你的虚拟币或其它游戏物品后尽快付款。

sentences.english: The undated Cheh-Kiang coins must have been made up at that time.
sentences.chinese: 无日期的浙江币一定也是在那时铸造的。

sentences.english: All fees are payable by cash, Nets, Giro or cheque in Singapore dollar.
sentences.chinese: 课程费用的付款货币是新加坡币。

sentences.english: During that year, the U. S. mint released four new pennies.
sentences.chinese: 在那一年，美国铸币厂发行四个新便士币。

sentences.english: Bitcoin has got geeks excited. What about economists?
sentences.chinese: 比特币让极客兴奋不已。经济学家怎么看？

sentences.english: I wish to change some British sterling into Renminbisexual.
sentences.chinese: 我想把一些英镑换成黎民币。

sentences.english: The Parable of the Talents is one of thestories Jesus told to teach a moral lesson.
sentences.chinese: 塔兰特币寓言是耶稣用来教导道德的故事之一。

sentences.english: He immediately used the same nickel to buy one of Billy's cakes.
sentences.chinese: 他立即用同样的五美分币买了比利的一块蛋糕。

sentences.english: All the clever cryptography means BitCoin dealings are difficult to trace.
sentences.chinese: 所有聪明的密码学家都表示跟踪比特币交易很困难。

sentences.english: The rate at which Bitcoins are minted is designed to mimic the extraction of minerals.
sentences.chinese: 比特币的铸造速度模拟了矿产开发。

sentences.english: Can you give me a dime for two nickels?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我把一角钱兑换成两个五分币吗？

definition: Fabi, first currency issued by the 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] in 1935, in use until 1948
token (used instead of money for slot machines, in game arcades etc)
fractional currency (coin or note of value smaller than the country's unit of currency)/token (used instead of money for slot machines etc)
